thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 8 of 159
thread.title: customer43

author: customer43
title: customer43
text: I have to say to start out that the website is clunky and not real user friendly, but once you figure it out, things go faster. The selection of frames is pretty broad as is the price range. For someone like me with astigmatism and high corrections, choosing the very high index lens material is a must, and makes the lenses very expensive, but still less expensive than at an optical shop. The glasses arrived in a little over a week, and doing the fitting myself required a bit of trial and error, but wasn't that difficult. All said, I'd order from SmartBuyGlasses again.
